languages.text: "Отчасти. Голосовой модулятор был имплантирован мне вместе с респираторной очистительной системой. Но есть и иная причина — готик не является родным для меня языком. Я привык мыслить и излагать суждения на {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}лингва-технис{/g}. Бинарный язык информативнее, эргономичнее и менее подвержен ошибочному восприятию".

traits.locale_text: "Отчасти. Голосовой модулятор был имплантирован мне вместе с респираторной очистительной системой. Но есть и иная причина — готик не является родным для меня языком. Я привык мыслить и излагать суждения на {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}лингва-технис{/g}. Бинарный язык информативнее, эргономичнее и менее подвержен ошибочному восприятию".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Partially true. I had a voice modulator implanted alongside the respiratory purification module, but there is an additional reason. Gothic is not my first language. I am used to thinking and making statements in {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}Lingua-Technis{/g}. The binharic language is more informative, more ergonomic, and less prone to misinterpretation."

languages.text: “这种说法部分属实，我确实在呼吸器模块旁植入了声音调节器，但还有另一个原因。哥特语并不是我的第一语言，我更习惯使用{g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}科技之语{/g}进行思考和陈述。二进制语言的信息量更大，更适合进行人机控制，而且也更不容易产生误解。”
languages.original_text: "Partially true. I had a voice modulator implanted alongside the respiratory purification module, but there is an additional reason. Gothic is not my first language. I am used to thinking and making statements in {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}Lingua-Technis{/g}. The binharic language is more informative, more ergonomic, and less prone to misinterpretation."

traits.locale_text: “这种说法部分属实，我确实在呼吸器模块旁植入了声音调节器，但还有另一个原因。哥特语并不是我的第一语言，我更习惯使用{g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}科技之语{/g}进行思考和陈述。二进制语言的信息量更大，更适合进行人机控制，而且也更不容易产生误解。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Es parcialmente cierto. Me implantaron un modulador de voz junto al módulo de purificación respiratoria, pero hay otro motivo. El gótico no es mi primer idioma. Estoy acostumbrado a pensar y expresarme en {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}tecnolingua{/g}. El idioma binario es más informativo y ergonómico y menos propenso a errores de interpretación».
languages.original_text: "Partially true. I had a voice modulator implanted alongside the respiratory purification module, but there is an additional reason. Gothic is not my first language. I am used to thinking and making statements in {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}Lingua-Technis{/g}. The binharic language is more informative, more ergonomic, and less prone to misinterpretation."

traits.locale_text: «Es parcialmente cierto. Me implantaron un modulador de voz junto al módulo de purificación respiratoria, pero hay otro motivo. El gótico no es mi primer idioma. Estoy acostumbrado a pensar y expresarme en {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}tecnolingua{/g}. El idioma binario es más informativo y ergonómico y menos propenso a errores de interpretación».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「部分的には本当だ。私は呼吸浄化モジュールと一緒に音声モジュレーターを埋め込んだが、それにはもうひとつ理由がある。ゴシック語は私の母語ではないのだ。私は{g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}テクナ・リングア/g}で考えたり発言したりすることに慣れている。バイナリック語のほうが情報量が多く、人間工学的で、誤解を招きにくいのだ」
languages.original_text: "Partially true. I had a voice modulator implanted alongside the respiratory purification module, but there is an additional reason. Gothic is not my first language. I am used to thinking and making statements in {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}Lingua-Technis{/g}. The binharic language is more informative, more ergonomic, and less prone to misinterpretation."

traits.locale_text: 「部分的には本当だ。私は呼吸浄化モジュールと一緒に音声モジュレーターを埋め込んだが、それにはもうひとつ理由がある。ゴシック語は私の母語ではないのだ。私はリ{g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}ンガ・テクニス{/g}で考えたり発言したりすることに慣れている。バイナリック語のほうが情報量が多く、人間工学的で、誤解を招きにくいのだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Teilweise wahr. Ich habe zusätzlich zum Atemluftreinigungsmodul einen Stimmmodulator implantieren lassen, doch es gibt noch einen zusätzlichen Grund. Gotisch ist nicht meine Muttersprache. Ich bin es gewohnt, auf {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}Lingua Technis{/g} zu denken und Aussagen zu tätigen. Binhärsprech ist informativer, ergonomischer und weniger anfällig für Fehlinterpretationen."
languages.original_text: "Partially true. I had a voice modulator implanted alongside the respiratory purification module, but there is an additional reason. Gothic is not my first language. I am used to thinking and making statements in {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}Lingua-Technis{/g}. The binharic language is more informative, more ergonomic, and less prone to misinterpretation."

traits.locale_text: "Teilweise wahr. Ich habe zusätzlich zum Atemluftreinigungsmodul einen Stimmmodulator implantieren lassen, doch es gibt noch einen zusätzlichen Grund. Gotisch ist nicht meine Muttersprache. Ich bin es gewohnt, auf {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}Lingua Technis{/g} zu denken und Aussagen zu tätigen. Binhärsprech ist informativer, ergonomischer und weniger anfällig für Fehlinterpretationen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « C'est en partie vrai. Je me suis fait implanter un modulateur vocal implanté avec mon module de purification respiratoire, mais ce n'est pas la seule raison. Le gothique n'est pas ma langue principale ; je parle et réfléchis plus généralement en {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}langage technique{/g}. Le binhaire est porteur de plus d'informations, plus ergonomique et rarement sujet aux interprétations erronées. »
languages.original_text: "Partially true. I had a voice modulator implanted alongside the respiratory purification module, but there is an additional reason. Gothic is not my first language. I am used to thinking and making statements in {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}Lingua-Technis{/g}. The binharic language is more informative, more ergonomic, and less prone to misinterpretation."

traits.locale_text: « C'est en partie vrai. Je me suis fait implanter un modulateur vocal implanté avec mon module de purification respiratoire, mais ce n'est pas la seule raison. Le gothique n'est pas ma langue principale ; je parle et réfléchis plus généralement en {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}langage technique{/g}. Le binhaire est porteur de plus d'informations, plus ergonomique et rarement sujet aux interprétations erronées. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "Partially true. I had a voice modulator implanted alongside the respiratory purification module, but there is an additional reason. Gothic is not my first language. I am used to thinking and making statements in Lingua-Technis. The binharic language is more informative, more ergonomic, and less prone to misinterpretation."

languages.text: "Kısmen doğru. İmplantlarımın arasında, solunum arındırma modülünün yanı sıra bir de ses modülatörü bulunuyor. Tabii bunun farklı bir sebebi daha var. Gotik benim anadilim değil. {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}Lingua Technis'te{/g} düşünmeye ve önermelerde bulunmaya alışığımdır. İkilidil daha bilgilendirici, daha ergonomik ve yanlış yorumlanmaya daha eğilimsiz."
languages.original_text: "Partially true. I had a voice modulator implanted alongside the respiratory purification module, but there is an additional reason. Gothic is not my first language. I am used to thinking and making statements in {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}Lingua-Technis{/g}. The binharic language is more informative, more ergonomic, and less prone to misinterpretation."

traits.locale_text: "Kısmen doğru. İmplantlarımın arasında, solunum arındırma modülünün yanı sıra bir de ses modülatörü bulunuyor ancak bunun farklı bir sebebi daha var. Gotik benim anadilim değil. {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}Lingua Technis{/g}'te düşünmeye ve önermelerde bulunmaya alışığımdır. İkidil daha bilgilendirici, daha ergonomik ve yanlış yorumlanmaya daha az yatkın."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
